title: Safety certifications (electrical, fire, structural, chemical)
personalDataVerified: Manufacturer name, facility location, inspector ID, certification body, certificate number, standards met (UL, NFPA, ASTM, etc.), issue date, expiration date
personalDataVisible: Revocation date (if revoked). Recall status (if product recalled). Link to certification body system (regulatory inspectors and enforcement officials, requires login)
rationale: Domain binding prevents fake certifying bodies. Human-readable certificate format. Tamper-evident. Critical for electrical products, building materials, chemical safety. Regulators and fire marshals can verify instantly. Prevents sale of uncertified dangerous products.
